name: Wizard Dimension
description:
Messing around with Godot for the Stop Waiting For Godot jam. Keeping it really simple with this one. I have been playing Dragon Quest IV, so honestly I just wanted to make a Dragon Quest text box.

Story: You are Rod Wizard, the Master of the Rod. You have cast a spell that has trapped a bunch of wizards in a pocket dimension for all eternity. There's not much you can do about it, so you just wander around and hang out I guess. There's a lot of lore of course I didn't just come up with all this story in 2 minutes.

Controls: Use WASD or arrow keys to move around and Space to jump. I think there's gamepad support but I didn't test it. Enjoy(?)

"At least you can move the camera and the character at the same time." -- World's #1 Wizard Dimension Fan
